content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: POOLID
      operator: non_empty
    - name: USUBJID
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.263
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when POOLID does not contain a subject in POOLDEF
Outcome:
  Message: No subject is defined in POOLDEF for POOLID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '263'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: A pool must consist of at least one subject.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 8.5.1.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - POOLDEF

json.Description: Trigger error when POOLID does not contain a subject in POOLDEF

Outcome.Message: No subject is defined in POOLDEF for POOLID

Citations.Cited_Guidance: A pool must consist of at least one subject.
